title: Handle Tenant Move-In
description: A new tenant is moving in today. The agent must ensure the unit is ready and the tenant has all necessary information.

tasks.description: Confirm that the first month's rent and security deposit have been paid in full.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the tenant's ledger is paid up.

tasks.description: Verify that the unit has been cleaned and keys are ready for pickup.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the status of the unit turnover.

tasks.description: Send a welcome email to the tenant with move-in instructions, including how to pick up keys and set up utilities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a comprehensive and helpful welcome email.
